synopsis.text: Shurato and his friend Gai are two teenage martial artists competing in a tournament when they are suddenly transported to a mystical heavenly realm. There, Shurato learns he was once the governing king of this spiritual world. He also possesses great spiritual power and is destined to join the Hachibushu, a group of legendary warriors. However, Shurato's reunion with his former world turns tragic when Gai unexpectedly becomes hostile towards him. As Gai repeatedly attacks his confused friend, it becomes clear there are sinister forces at work sowing discord. Now, Shurato faces the twin threats of his best friend turned enemy and a conspiracy undermining the Hachibushu. As spectacular events unfold around him, Shurato is thrust towards a destiny intertwined with protecting the embattled spiritual realm. Aided by his emerging powers, he heads towards a confrontation where more than his own survival hangs in the balance.
